overview: Directing Faces Conferences since the company began in 1986, Dr. Fields has over thirty years of experience in conference development and delivery. During this time he has organized countless CE Conferences. He is the former Assistantâ€“Director of the National Institute on Drug Abuse’s (NIDA) Western Regional Training Center.
